page.title: 04HIGH LOW FARM
page.content: High Low Farm is typical of the farms in the area.Currently the farmer has 75 Fresian milk cows,12 cows in calf,14 Heifer calves,60 stirks and 1 Hereford bull.Also on the farm are 70 sheep,35 having lambed this year,and 3 sheepdogs.To complete the farm there were 12 hens,12 guinea fowl and three ducks.The farm is mainly concerned with milk production and the land round about is given over to pasture,hay making or silage with only narrow strips given over to barley and oat production.The farm itself has 5 byres and numerous sheds and barns with a large farmhouse that has had a modern kitchen built on.The yard is cobbled.Near the farm on our map was meadow cottage,but we could only find a path and pieces of stone to show where it had stood.
